resources.string: Field Email and Password must be filled
Field Name, Email and Password must be filled
Password must contain at least 6 characters
New user registration is successful, please login using the registered email and password

Permision Denied 

 Please do the following steps : 
 1. Open the profile menu and open the App Permissions 
 2. Select permission on app info 
 3. Select permission for camera 
 4. Select the option allow only while using the app
